desmoj.extensions.visualization2d.engine.model

Class Route

  • java.lang.Object
    • desmoj.extensions.visualization2d.engine.model.Container<java.lang.Long>
      • desmoj.extensions.visualization2d.engine.model.Route
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Basic, ClassBasic

    public class Route
extends Container<java.lang.Long>
    A route is a polyline between a start- and a end-station. The line has a length and an entity can move on it with a velocity stored in its velocity-attribute

      • getRelPosition

        public java.lang.Object[][] getRelPosition(long time)
        Compute the relative position of every entity in this route (container). This is a value between 0 (start of route) and 1 (end of route).
        Parameters:
        time - actual simulation time
        Returns:
        getRelPosition(long time)[i][0]: key of i.th entity in route (String). getRelPosition(long time)[i][1]: relative Position of i.th entity in route (Double).
